main_definition: Citizens are individuals who have the legal status of being a member of a particular country, with rights and responsibilities towards that nation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Residents of a city or town
meanings_and_examples.example: As residents of New York City, they are proud to call the Big Apple their home.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Members of a community with shared interests and goals
meanings_and_examples.example: The local citizens group advocated for more green spaces in their neighborhood.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals who are subject to the laws, taxes, and governance of a country
meanings_and_examples.example: As American citizens, they were eligible to vote in national elections.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Members of an organization with specific rights and privileges
meanings_and_examples.example: The members of the chess club have access to exclusive tournaments and training sessions.
